task_summary: Concise overview of what was analyzed or researched.

video_analysis.video_title: Title or identifier of the video
video_analysis.transcription_summary: Short summarized transcript of key sections.

notable_quotes.quote: This is a key statement from the speaker.

video_analysis.visual_summary: Summary of visual elements and changes throughout the video.

insights: Insight 2: Contrasting viewpoints or unique data.

conclusion: Final summary combining both video analysis and research findings into actionable takeaways.
confidence_score: Optional: Percentage or qualitative assessment of AI confidence in the outputs.
